quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies . . . The man who never reads lives only one.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: I would never read a book if it were possible for me to talk half an hour with the man who wrote it.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: If you don’t like to read, you haven’t found the right book.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Reading is essential for those who seek to rise above the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: There is no friend as loyal as a book.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame.
author: Oscar Wild

quote: It is a great thing to start life with a small number of really good books which are your very own.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
